verses.verse: וּבַשָּׁנָ֨ה <WH8141> year הַשְּׁבִעִ֜ית <WH7637> And in the seventh הִתְחַזַּ֣ק <WH2388> strengthened יְהוֹיָדָ֗ע <WH3077> Jehoiada וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> himself and took אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> of hundreds לַעֲזַרְיָ֣הוּ <WH5838> Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son יְרֹחָ֡ם <WH3395> of Jeroham וּלְיִשְׁמָעֵ֣אל <WH3458> and Ishmael בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son יְ֠הוֹחָנָן <WH3076> of Jehohanan וְלַֽעֲזַרְיָ֨הוּ <WH5838> and Azariah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עוֹבֵ֜ד <WH5744> of Obed וְאֶת־ <WH853> מַעֲשֵׂיָ֧הוּ <WH4641> and Maaseiah בֶן־ <WH1121> the son עֲדָיָ֛הוּ <WH5718> of Adaiah וְאֶת־ <WH853> אֱלִישָׁפָ֥ט <WH478> and Elishaphat בֶּן־ <WH1121> the son זִכְרִ֖י <WH2147> of Zichri עִמּ֥וֹ <WH5973> into בַבְּרִֽית׃ <WH1285> into covenant

וַיָּסֹ֙בּוּ֙ <WH5437> And they went about בִּֽיהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> in Judah וַיִּקְבְּצ֤וּ <WH6908> and gathered אֶת־ <WH853> הַלְוִיִּם֙ <WH3881> the Levites מִכָּל־ <WH3605> all עָרֵ֣י <WH5892> out of all the cities יְהוּדָ֔ה <WH3063> of Judah וְרָאשֵׁ֥י <WH7218> and the chief הָאָב֖וֹת <WH1> of the fathers לְיִשְׂרָאֵ֑ל <WH3478> of Israel וַיָּבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> and they came אֶל־ <WH413> to יְרוּשָׁלִָֽם׃ <WH3389> to Jerusalem

וַיִּכְרֹ֨ת <WH3772> made כָּל־ <WH3605> all הַקָּהָ֥ל <WH6951> And all the congregation בְּרִ֛ית <WH1285> a covenant בְּבֵ֥ית <WH1004> in the house הָאֱלֹהִ֖ים <WH430> of God עִם־ <WH5973> with הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> with the king וַיֹּ֣אמֶר <WH559> And he said לָהֶ֗ם <WH1992> to them הִנֵּ֤ה <WH2009> Behold בֶן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> unto them Behold the king's יִמְלֹ֔ךְ <WH4427> shall reign כַּאֲשֶׁ֛ר <WH834> after דִּבֶּ֥ר <WH1696> hath said יְהוָ֖ה <WH3069> God עַל־ <WH5921> concerning בְּנֵ֥י <WH1121> of the sons דָוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> of David

זֶ֥ה <WH2088> This הַדָּבָ֖ר <WH1697> This [is] the thing אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> which תַּעֲשׂ֑וּ <WH6213> that ye shall do הַשְּׁלִשִׁ֨ית <WH7992> A third part מִכֶּ֜ם <WH4480> who בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> of you entering הַשַּׁבָּ֗ת <WH7676> on the sabbath לַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> of the priests וְלַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> and of the Levites לְשֹֽׁעֲרֵ֖י <WH7778> [shall be] porters הַסִּפִּֽים׃ <WH5592> of the doors

וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁית֙ <WH7992> And a third part בְּבֵ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> [shall be] at the king's וְהַשְּׁלִשִׁ֖ית <WH7992> and a third part בְּשַׁ֣עַר <WH8179> at the gate הַיְס֑וֹד <WH3247> of the foundation וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> and all the people בְּחַצְר֖וֹת <WH2691> [shall be] in the courts בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְאַל־ <WH408> no יָב֣וֹא <WH935> But let none come בֵית־ <WH1004> into the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כִּ֤י <WH3588> for אִם־ <WH518> lo הַכֹּֽהֲנִים֙ <WH3548> save the priests וְהַמְשָׁרְתִ֣ים <WH8334> and they that minister לַלְוִיִּ֔ם <WH3881> of the Levites הֵ֥מָּה <WH1992> they יָבֹ֖אוּ <WH935> they shall go in כִּי־ <WH3588> for קֹ֣דֶשׁ <WH6944> for they [are] holy הֵ֑מָּה <WH1992> and let וְכָל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֔ם <WH5971> but all the people יִשְׁמְר֖וּ <WH8104> shall keep מִשְׁמֶ֥רֶת <WH4931> the watch יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וְהִקִּיפוּ֩ <WH5362> shall compass הַלְוִיִּ֨ם <WH3881> And the Levites אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֜לֶךְ <WH4428> the king סָבִ֗יב <WH5439> round about אִ֚ישׁ <WH376> every man וְכֵלָ֣יו <WH3627> with his weapons בְּיָד֔וֹ <WH3027> in his hand וְהַבָּ֥א <WH935> and whosoever [else] cometh אֶל־ <WH413> about הַבַּ֖יִת <WH1004> into the house יוּמָ֑ת <WH4191> he shall be put to death וִֽהְי֥וּ <WH1961> become אֶת־ <WH854> Thus be with הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> but be ye with the king בְּבֹא֥וֹ <WH935> when he cometh in וּבְצֵאתֽוֹ׃ <WH3318> and when he goeth out

וַיַּעֲשׂ֨וּ <WH6213> did הַלְוִיִּ֜ם <WH3881> So the Levites וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all יְהוּדָ֗ה <WH3063> and all Judah כְּכֹ֣ל <WH3605> to all אֲשֶׁר־ <WH834> after צִוָּה֮ <WH6680> had commanded יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> according to all things that Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵן֒ <WH3548> the priest וַיִּקְחוּ֙ <WH3947> and took אִ֣ישׁ <WH376> every man אֶת־ <WH853> אֲנָשָׁ֔יו <WH376> one בָּאֵ֣י <WH935> that were to come in הַשַּׁבָּ֔ת <WH7676> on the sabbath עִ֖ם <WH5973> were to יוֹצְאֵ֣י <WH3318> with them that were to go הַשַּׁבָּ֑ת <WH7676> [out] on the sabbath כִּ֣י <WH3588> for לֹ֥א <WH3808> did not פָטַ֛ר <WH6362> dismiss יְהוֹיָדָ֥ע <WH3077> for Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֖ן <WH3548> the priest אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽמַּחְלְקֽוֹת׃ <WH4256> not the courses

וַיִּתֵּן֩ <WH5414> delivered יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> Moreover Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest לְשָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> to the captains הַמֵּא֗וֹת <WH3967> of hundreds אֶת־ <WH853> הַֽחֲנִיתִים֙ <WH2595> spears וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמָּגִנּוֹת֙ <WH4043> and bucklers וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַשְּׁלָטִ֔ים <WH7982> and shields אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which לַמֶּ֣לֶךְ <WH4428> that [had been] king דָּוִ֑יד <WH1732> David's אֲשֶׁ֖ר <WH834> which בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> which [were] in the house הָאֱלֹהִֽים׃ <WH430> of God

וַיַּעֲמֵ֨ד <WH5975> And he set אֶת־ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> all הָעָ֜ם <WH5971> all the people וְאִ֣ישׁ ׀ <WH376> every man שִׁלְח֣וֹ <WH7973> having his weapon בְיָד֗וֹ <WH3027> in his hand מִכֶּ֨תֶף <WH3802> side הַבַּ֤יִת <WH1004> of the temple הַיְמָנִית֙ <WH3233> from the right עַד־ <WH5704> against כֶּ֤תֶף <WH3802> side הַבַּ֙יִת֙ <WH1004> of the temple הַשְּׂמָאלִ֔ית <WH8042> to the left לַמִּזְבֵּ֖חַ <WH4196> along by the altar וְלַבָּ֑יִת <WH1004> and the temple עַל־ <WH5921> and הַמֶּ֖לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king סָבִֽיב׃ <WH5439> round about

וַיּוֹצִ֣יאוּ <WH3318> Then they brought out אֶת־ <WH853> בֶּן־ <WH1121> son הַמֶּ֗לֶךְ <WH4428> the king's וַיִּתְּנ֤וּ <WH5414> and put עָלָיו֙ <WH5921> and אֶת־ <WH853> הַנֵּ֙זֶר֙ <WH5145> upon him the crown וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָ֣עֵד֔וּת <WH5715> and [gave him] the testimony וַיַּמְלִ֖יכוּ <WH4427> and made him king אֹת֑וֹ <WH853> וַיִּמְשָׁחֻ֙הוּ֙ <WH4886> anointed יְהוֹיָדָ֣ע <WH3077> And Jehoiada וּבָנָ֔יו <WH1121> and his sons וַיֹּאמְר֖וּ <WH559> him and said יְחִ֥י <WH2421> God save הַמֶּֽלֶךְ׃ <WH4428> the king ס

וַתִּשְׁמַ֣ע <WH8085> heard עֲתַלְיָ֗הוּ <WH6271> Now when Athaliah אֶת־ <WH853> ק֤וֹל <WH6963> the noise הָעָם֙ <WH5971> of the people הָֽרָצִ֔ים <WH7323> running וְהַֽמְהַֽלְלִ֖ים <WH1984> and praising אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> the king וַתָּב֥וֹא <WH935> she came אֶל־ <WH413> to הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> to the people בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> into the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַתֵּ֡רֶא <WH7200> And she looked וְהִנֵּ֣ה <WH2009> and behold הַמֶּלֶךְ֩ <WH4428> and behold the king עוֹמֵ֨ד <WH5975> stood עַֽל־ <WH5921> beside עַמּוּד֜וֹ <WH5982> at his pillar בַּמָּב֗וֹא <WH3996> at the entering in וְהַשָּׂרִ֣ים <WH8269> and the princes וְהַחֲצֹצְרוֹת֮ <WH2689> and the trumpets עַל־ <WH5921> beside הַמֶּלֶךְ֒ <WH4428> by the king וְכָל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֨ם <WH5971> and all the people הָאָ֜רֶץ <WH776> of the land שָׂמֵ֗חַ <WH8055> cheer up וְתוֹקֵ֙עַ֙ <WH8628> and sounded בַּחֲצֹ֣צְר֔וֹת <WH2689> with trumpets וְהַמְשֽׁוֹרֲרִים֙ <WH7891> also the singers בִּכְלֵ֣י <WH3627> with instruments הַשִּׁ֔יר <WH7892> of musick וּמוֹדִיעִ֖ים <WH3045> and such as taught לְהַלֵּ֑ל <WH1984> to sing praise וַתִּקְרַ֤ע <WH7167> rent עֲתַלְיָ֙הוּ֙ <WH6271> Then Athaliah אֶת־ <WH853> בְּגָדֶ֔יהָ <WH899> her clothes וַתֹּ֖אמֶר <WH559> and said קֶ֥שֶׁר <WH7195> Treason קָֽשֶׁר׃ <WH7195> Treason ס

וַיּוֹצֵא֩ <WH3318> brought out יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> Then Jehoiada הַכֹּהֵ֜ן <WH3548> the priest אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֥י <WH8269> the captains הַמֵּא֣וֹת ׀ <WH3967> of hundreds פְּקוּדֵ֣י <WH6485> that were set over הַחַ֗יִל <WH2428> the host וַיֹּ֤אמֶר <WH559> and said אֲלֵהֶם֙ <WH413> to הֽוֹצִיא֙וּהָ֙ <WH3318> unto them Have her forth אֶל־ <WH413> in מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> her not in the house הַשְּׂדֵר֔וֹת <WH7713> the ranks וְהַבָּ֥א <WH935> abide אַחֲרֶ֖יהָ <WH310> after that יוּמַ֣ת <WH4191> her let him be slain בֶּחָ֑רֶב <WH2719> with the sword כִּ֚י <WH3588> for אָמַ֣ר <WH559> said הַכֹּהֵ֔ן <WH3548> For the priest לֹ֥א <WH3808> not תְמִית֖וּהָ <WH4191> Slay בֵּ֥ית <WH1004> the house יְהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> of the LORD

וַיָּשִׂ֤ימוּ <WH7760> So they laid לָהּ֙ יָדַ֔יִם <WH3027> hands וַתָּב֛וֹא <WH935> on her and when she was come אֶל־ <WH413> at מְב֥וֹא <WH3996> to the entering שַֽׁעַר־ <WH8179> gate הַסּוּסִ֖ים <WH5483> of the horse בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> by the king's וַיְמִית֖וּהָ <WH4191> they slew שָֽׁם׃ <WH8033> there פ

וַיִּכְרֹ֤ת <WH3772> made יְהוֹיָדָע֙ <WH3077> And Jehoiada בְּרִ֔ית <WH1285> a covenant בֵּינ֕וֹ <WH996> between וּבֵ֥ין <WH996> between כָּל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֖ם <WH5971> between him and between all the people וּבֵ֣ין <WH996> between הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> and between the king לִהְי֥וֹת <WH1961> become לְעָ֖ם <WH5971> people לַיהוָֽה׃ <WH3068> that they should be the LORD'S

וַיָּבֹ֨אוּ <WH935> went כָל־ <WH3605> and all הָעָ֤ם <WH5971> Then all the people בֵּית־ <WH1004> to the house הַבַּ֙עַל֙ <WH1168> of Baal וַֽיִּתְּצֻ֔הוּ <WH5422> and brake it down וְאֶת־ <WH853> מִזְבְּחֹתָ֥יו <WH4196> his altars וְאֶת־ <WH853> צְלָמָ֖יו <WH6754> and his images שִׁבֵּ֑רוּ <WH7665> in pieces וְאֵ֗ת <WH853> מַתָּן֙ <WH4977> Mattan כֹּהֵ֣ן <WH3548> the priest הַבַּ֔עַל <WH1168> of Baal הָרְג֖וּ <WH2026> and slew לִפְנֵ֥י <WH6440> before הַֽמִּזְבְּחֽוֹת׃ <WH4196> the altars

וַיָּשֶׂם֩ <WH7760> appointed יְהוֹיָדָ֨ע <WH3077> Also Jehoiada פְּקֻדֹּ֜ת <WH6486> the offices בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD בְּיַ֨ד <WH3027> by the hand הַכֹּהֲנִ֣ים <WH3548> of the priests הַלְוִיִּם֮ <WH3881> the Levites אֲשֶׁ֣ר <WH834> whom חָלַ֣ק <WH2505> had distributed דָּוִיד֮ <WH1732> whom David עַל־ <WH5921> over בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> in the house יְהוָה֒ <WH3068> of the LORD לְֽהַעֲל֞וֹת <WH5927> to offer עֹל֣וֹת <WH5930> the burnt offerings יְהוָ֗ה <WH3068> of the LORD כַּכָּת֛וּב <WH3789> as [it is] written בְּתוֹרַ֥ת <WH8451> in the law מֹשֶׁ֖ה <WH4872> of Moses בְּשִׂמְחָ֣ה <WH8057> with rejoicing וּבְשִׁ֑יר <WH7892> and with singing עַ֖ל <WH5921> according יְדֵ֥י <WH3027> [as it was ordained] by דָוִֽיד׃ <WH1732> David

וַֽיַּעֲמֵד֙ <WH5975> And he set הַשּׁ֣וֹעֲרִ֔ים <WH7778> the porters עַֽל־ <WH5921> at שַׁעֲרֵ֖י <WH8179> at the gates בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> of the house יְהוָ֑ה <WH3068> of the LORD וְלֹֽא־ <WH3808> no יָבֹ֥א <WH935> should enter in טָמֵ֖א <WH2931> that none [which was] unclean לְכָל־ <WH3605> any דָּבָֽר׃ <WH1697> in any thing

וַיִּקַּ֣ח <WH3947> And he took אֶת־ <WH853> שָׂרֵ֣י <WH8269> the captains הַמֵּא֡וֹת <WH3967> of hundreds וְאֶת־ <WH853> הָֽאַדִּירִים֩ <WH117> and the nobles וְאֶת־ <WH853> הַמּֽוֹשְׁלִ֨ים <WH4910> and the governors בָּעָ֜ם <WH5971> of the people וְאֵ֣ת ׀ <WH853> כָּל־ <WH3605> and all עַ֣ם <WH5971> and all the people הָאָ֗רֶץ <WH776> of the land וַיּ֤וֹרֶד <WH3381> and brought down אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֙לֶךְ֙ <WH4428> the king מִבֵּ֣ית <WH1004> from the house יְהוָ֔ה <WH3068> of the LORD וַיָּבֹ֛אוּ <WH935> and they came בְּתֽוֹךְ־ <WH8432> through שַׁ֥עַר <WH8179> gate הָֽעֶלְי֖וֹן <WH5945> the high בֵּ֣ית <WH1004> house הַמֶּ֑לֶךְ <WH4428> into the king's וַיּוֹשִׁ֙יבוּ֙ <WH3427> and set אֶת־ <WH853> הַמֶּ֔לֶךְ <WH4428> the king עַ֖ל <WH5921> on כִּסֵּ֥א <WH3678> upon the throne הַמַּמְלָכָֽה׃ <WH4467> of the kingdom

וַיִּשְׂמְח֥וּ <WH8055> rejoiced כָל־ <WH3605> all עַם־ <WH5971> And all the people הָאָ֖רֶץ <WH776> of the land וְהָעִ֣יר <WH5892> and the city שָׁקָ֑טָה <WH8252> was quiet וְאֶת־ <WH853> עֲתַלְיָ֖הוּ <WH6271> Athaliah הֵמִ֥יתוּ <WH4191> after that they had slain בֶחָֽרֶב׃ <WH2719> with the sword ס
